description.value:
When you reach a Sorcerer level specified in the Death Domain Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

Death Domain Spells
Sorcerer LevelSpells
3@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplBlindnessD]{Blindness/Deafness}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplFalseLife0]{False Life}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplRayOfEnfee]{Ray of Enfeeblement}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplRayOfSickn]{Ray of Sickness}
5@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplAnimateDea]{Animate Dead}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplVampiricTo]{Vampiric Touch}
7@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplBlight0000]{Blight}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDeathWard0]{Death Ward}
9@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplAntilifeSh]{Antilife Shell}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplCloudkill0]{Cloudkill}
